content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  May 01 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned an 'A+' rating to Texas Instruments Incorporated's (TI) $600 million senior notes offering  comprised of $300 million of 2.75% senior notes due March 12  2021 and $300 million of 2.625% senior notes due May 15  2024. Fitch expects the company will use a portion of net proceeds to repay $375 million of senior notes maturing June 15  2017 (assumed in connection with the 2011 acquisition o
name: Texas Instruments Incorporated
title: Fitch Rates Texas Instruments Senior Notes 'A+'; Outlook Stable
